comments.en:
This printer has a PCL3 core, but very stretched so it is able to control the new printhead technology. It is the same as the Sharp AJ-2000 and therefore it works with the "sharp.upp" and the "pcl3" drivers.

The Sharp AJ-1800/1805/2000/2005 and the Xerox DocuPrint M750/M760 are very similar and can all be used with the same drivers. For how to get the best out of these printers, see the page of the Sharp AJ-2000.
